group.name: Everything
group.statement: SELECT A.RUN_STAT, A.ON_OFF_FRMLY_STAT FROM VRAP.TFRMLY_EXP_CNTL A WHERE A.FRMLY_EXP_ID = (SELECT MAX(FRMLY_EXP_ID) FROM VRAP.TFRMLY_EXP_CNTL) WITH UR
UPDATE VRAP.TFRMLY_EXP_CNTL A SET A.RUN_STAT = 2 WHERE A.RUN_STAT = 1 AND A.FRMLY_EXP_ID = (SELECT MAX(FRMLY_EXP_ID) FROM VRAP.TFRMLY_EXP_CNTL)
